Summary: Ufo is spotted at 911 WTC. I was researching archive footage.
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York

divs: Sighting DetailsI was researching footage of wtc 911 goto youtube and lookup," 42 Angles OF WTC" I dont know how to attach the videos to this so please take a moment and look at this and let me know what you think. Hey check this out.. pause the video on 5:39 look approx: 1 Oclock a silver ufo appears in the film. Next another film so I am not seeing things sceen pause 8:51-8:54 look 7 oclock a silver disk DEFY's Gravity moving left then right at speeds of 1000 mph! What was that! Pause 8:56 another camera caugt the same frickin thing at 7 Oclock a UFO! What is the disclouser on that ! Thanks for the time. Respectfully, John J. Fasano
